TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract SecurityAlgorithmSuite extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定算法的属性。

span.span: Specifies properties of algorithms.

summary.span: 这是一个 类。

span.span: This is an class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例用于指定在保护消息时所使用的算法的加密特性。Instances of this class are used to specify the cryptographic characteristics of the algorithms used when securing messages. 派生类使用此类实例化安全算法套件，并且此类还包含描述安全算法的属性。This class is used by derived classes to instantiate security algorithm suites, and contains properties that describe the security algorithms. 例如，`wsBasicHttp` 绑定使用内部派生类指定其安全算法的属性。For example, the `wsBasicHttp` binding uses an internal derived class to specify the properties of its security algorithms.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例由静态属性和只读属性组成，因此构造函数不初始化任何属性。The instances of this class consist of static properties and read-only properties, so the constructor does not initialize any properties.

summary.span: 获取 Basic128 算法套件。

span.span: Gets the Basic128 algorithm suite.

value.span: 128 位 Basic 。

span.span: The 128-bit Basic .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，AES-128 用作加密算法。By default, AES-128 is used as the encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Basic128Rsa15 As SecurityAlgorithmSuite

summary.span: 获取一个算法组，该算法组使用 RSA15 作为密钥换行算法，并使用 128 位 Basic 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

value.span: 一个算法组，该算法组使用 RSA15 作为密钥换行算法，并使用 128 位 Basic 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 实际上是一个内部子类，该子类重写一些指定默认值的属性和一些方法。The returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsSymmetricKeyLengthSupported(int32 length) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function IsSymmetricKeyLengthSupported (length As Integer) As Boolean

span.span: The key length to check.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，指示是否支持特定的对称密钥长度。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether a particular symmetric key length is supported.

returns.span: 如果支持对称密钥长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the symmetric key length is supported; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据子类，将 `length` 与一系列值进行比较。The `length` is compared to a range of values depending on the subclass. 例如，在 `TripleDES` 子类中，此方法验证 `length` 是否介于 192 和 256 之间（包括这两个值）。For example, in the `TripleDES` subclass, this method verifies that `length` is between 192 and 256, inclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TripleDesRsa15 As SecurityAlgorithmSuite

summary.span: 获取一个算法套件，该算法套件使用 RSA15 作为密钥换行算法，并使用 192 位三重数据加密标准 (DES) 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

value.span: 一个算法组，该算法组使用 RSA15 作为密钥换行算法，并使用 192 位三重数据加密标准 (DES) 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 实际上是一个内部子类，该子类重写一些指定默认值的属性和一些方法。The returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TripleDesSha256 As SecurityAlgorithmSuite

summary.span: 获取一个算法组，该算法组使用 SHA256 作为签名摘要算法，并使用 192 位三重数据加密标准 (DES) 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: Gets an algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

value.span: 一个算法组，该算法组使用 SHA256 作为签名摘要算法，并使用 192 位三重数据加密标准 (DES) 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: An algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TripleDesSha256Rsa15 As SecurityAlgorithmSuite

summary.span: 获取一个算法套件，该算法套件使用 RSA15 作为密钥换行算法，使用 SHA256 作为签名摘要算法，并使用 192 位三重数据加密标准 (DES) 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

value.span: 一个算法组，该算法组使用 RSA15 作为密钥换行算法，使用 SHA256 作为签名摘要算法，并使用 192 位三重数据加密标准 (DES) 作为消息加密算法。

span.span: An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.
